page.title: 04Life Styles_E.K.Saturday
page.content:
On a Saturday morning I usually get up between 9.00am and 9.30.When I get up,I watch T.V.,have my breakfast and get dressed.At about 12.15pm I leave to go to dancing which starts at 12.30pm.I do tap,modern and majorettes which is on until 1.45pm.After dancing I go straight home and have my lunch which is usually a sandwich and a cup of tea.Then I change into my new or good clothes to go over to my gran's.
At about 3.00pm I get a bus over to Glasgow where she lives.My mum and I arrive between 4.15pm and 4.30pm. When we get there,we have a cup of tea and I watch T.V.At between 5.30pm and 6.00pm we have dinner and afterwards I watch T.V. or read,and between about 10.00pm and 10.30pm,I go to bed.
